A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like:
In May of 1977\, after seeing Wars\, I walked on a Saturday morning to my local theatre\, I paid for a ticket\, and I watched every Star Wars until the theatre closed at 10pm. Since Return of the Jedi I have waited 30+ years to see my hero Luke Skywalker. 

Let me get this straight. Instead of showing our hero restoring the Jedi order or perhaps dying in a lightsable blaze of glory\, your idea of returning the childhood hero to millions in to depict him milking a space alien with oversized titties\, and then inexplicably vanishing into the sunset. 

And can someone please explain the relevance of the no-shirt scene? 
Was Kylo-Ren just raped or involved in some alien orgy? Thank God I didn't watch this in my own house...I would have baseball-batted my own television like my other childhood hero Reggie Jackson. 

Please cancel episode 9 immediately and remake this movie before the cast gets too old.
